response.overview: When a man digs in the middle of the wild midnight and his wife has disappeared at the same time, everyone assumes that he is digging to bury her body. But inspector Xefteris doesn't find the body and so he tries to find a body even from the classified ads. And then they make the appearance of poisoned meatballs, fillets ....
response.title: Xoris Malli kai Gnosi
